Question.Subject: What is an apple on moshi monsters.?
Question.Content: I was on a website that told me that there was one moshling that required a apple, what is an apple? Can anyone help? Anyone?
Question.ChosenAnswer: you have to be a member to get the apple it is called a snap apple you go to the port and there is a sign that says super seeds click on that and it will have all te regular seeds and a daisy and snap apples

Answer.Content: you have to be a member to get the apple it is called a snap apple you go to the port and there is a sign that says super seeds click on that and it will have all te regular seeds and a daisy and snap apples
